float32.name: Minimum Spawn Time
float32.tooltip: Absolute floor. Used to put a few-frame delay between death and instaspawn. Will not override longer minimum times.

float32.name: Minimum Acceptable Spawn Score
float32.tooltip: spawns with a score lower than this will never be used

plugin.comment: Values that affect randomization of respawn point selection Runtime will use the largest of '% best weight to use' and 'Min absolute weight range'

float32.name: Maximum Random Spawn Bias
float32.tooltip: Controls how large of a random value gets added to each spawn point

comment.title: Percent Number Spawn Points To Use

plugin.comment: Example - On a map with 140 respawn points, a value of 0.1 here will choose randomly between up to the best 14 points. Number of points considered is also limited by the following parameters and flags. If next two parameters are 0, only points with the exact same weight as the highest scoring respawn point will be considered. If 'Min absolute weight range' is 25 then the best 'X' points within 25 points of the highest scoring point will be considered.

float32.name: Percent Number Spawn Points To Use

plugin.comment: Example - Value of 0.25 will consider all points with weight within 25% of the highest scoring point. Note - At run-time, the larger of '% best weight to use' and 'Min absolute weight range' will be used. For instance if '% best weight' is 0.1 and 'Min absolute weight' is 5.0' a max weight of 150 will use 15, but a max weight of 10 will fall back on the min weight of 5
Example - Value of 50 will consider all points within 50 of the highest scoring point. Note - At run-time, the larger of '% best weight to use' and 'Min absolute weight range' will be used.

bit.name: Allow Negative Weights In Randomization
bit.tooltip: If checked, negative weighted respawn points are treated the same as ones with positive weight. If not checked, negative respawn points aren't grouped with positive weighted respawn points.

plugin.comment: 0: influencer - Enemy Forbid 1: influencer - Enemy Bias 2: influencer - Ally Bias 3: influencer - Selected Ally Bias 4: influencer - Dead Teammate 5: influencer - Respawn Zone 6: influencer - Weapon 7: influencer - Vehicle 8: influencer - Projectile 9: influencer - Equipment 10: influencer - Fireteam 1 zone 11: influencer - Fireteam 2 zone 12: influencer - Fireteam 3 zone 13: influencer - Fireteam 4 zone 14: influencer - Drop Pod 15: influencer - Auto Turret

bit.name: Pin Influence To Minimum And Maximum

plugin.comment: This is a tight cylinder around the player with a strong negative weight. It serves to protect players from spawning close to an enemy, or having and enemy spawn close to them.

tagblock.name: Falloff Function
tagblock.tooltip: Multiplier applied to weight (domain is full weight radius to fall-off radius, range should be 0 to 1).

plugin.comment: This is a larger cylinder, with a size set specifically for the size of the map. It has a weak negative weight which falls to zero towards the outer radius. It serves to bias players away from spawning near enemies, or in enemy held areas.

tagblock.name: Falloff Function
tagblock.tooltip: Multiplier applied to weight (domain is full weight radius to fall-off radius, range should be 0 to 1).

plugin.comment: This is a larger cylinder, with a size set specifically for the size of the map. It has a weak positive weight which falls to zero towards the outer radius. It serves to bias players towards spawning with allies, or in areas which are controlled by friendly players.

tagblock.name: Falloff Function
tagblock.tooltip: Multiplier applied to weight (domain is full weight radius to fall-off radius, range should be 0 to 1).

plugin.comment: Same as ALLY BIAS, but used when the ally is selected in the dead-camera.

tagblock.name: Falloff Function
tagblock.tooltip: Multiplier applied to weight (domain is full weight radius to fall-off radius, range should be 0 to 1).

plugin.comment: Dead teammate influences are cylinders centered upon the body of a dead teammate (or the player's own dead body).

tagblock.name: Falloff Function
tagblock.tooltip: Multiplier applied to weight (domain is full weight radius to fall-off radius, range should be 0 to 1).

plugin.comment: Drop pods influences are cylinders centered on unclaimed ordnance.

tagblock.name: Falloff Function
tagblock.tooltip: Multiplier applied to weight (domain is full weight radius to fall-off radius, range should be 0 to 1).

plugin.comment: Auto Turret influences are cylinders centered on players' auto turrets.

tagblock.name: Falloff Function
tagblock.tooltip: Multiplier applied to weight (domain is full weight radius to fall-off radius, range should be 0 to 1).

tagblock.name: Weapon Influencers
tagblock.tooltip: These influencers are induced by weapons either wielded or carried in the player's backpack

tagblock.name: Vehicle Influencers
tagblock.tooltip: These influencers are induced by vehicles.

float32.name: Box Minimum Height
float32.tooltip: How far influencer will extend below unit's origin. Will usually be negative. (If min and max are both 0, unit radius is used)

float32.name: Box Maximum Height
float32.tooltip: How far influencer will extend above unit's origin. Will usually be positive. (If min and max are both 0, unit radius is used)

tagblock.name: Projectile Influencers
tagblock.tooltip: These influencers are induced by projectiles.

tagblock.name: Equipment Influencers
tagblock.tooltip: These influencers are induced by equipment.
